Text:
This is being remade into I Am Legend with Will Smith later this year.
http://akas.imdb.com/title/tt0480249/

Cool upload, Credington.

The book is absolutely awesome. It was filmed in the 60s as "The last man on earth" and follows the book much closer than "The omega man". 
The remake with Will Smith later this year seems to be a rape of the book, though.

Cred!
Thanks man!  Have I ever been looking for this flick?? I saw it as a kid in the States and it scared the shit out of me. I must confess it still creeped me out when his dead wife came back.

Cheers mate!
Ah man I was just looking to get this movie. Thanks credington. I will seed once done since Im on vacation for a few weeks.
If you're looking for avi go here; http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3497434
The DVD ripper software said I had to strip out the subs to fit on a DVD.
strippin subs ? lol wtf ? use different ripper next time
thanx, but this doesnt play on dvd plyr unable to play due to region???

Use DVD Shrink or Decrypter to strip the region codes if any.

I had the avi and it was in single audio channel. I downloaded this one, and imagine my surprise, the movie was release in MONO audio.
